body:
@zikakuto Thanks for the info. Here's  the summary for the latest 2 chaps in one:
'Cause of MC's choice to take blonde outside, the cult and the politician found out about the undeground tunnels. The 1st chap shows that they sending people to investigate the tunnels but it's hard for them to locate where blonde is. 2nd chap gave us some info about politcian and cult. On the politician's backstory, he's a"started from the bottom now we're here" type who have bowed his head to many and abandoned his own family just to get go the point where he is now. Locating blonde to know the secret is his way to maintain his high life. Also, he's been to the tunnels before apparently, but we don't know what happened before blonde and doc started living there. About the cult, they're basically a scam to women to get their sex with this "Xeno-sama" filmed and sold online all for in the name of "salvation". As for how blonde and the politician is connected to this cult, it's still a mystery.
Still waiting for https://nhentai.net/g/187778/ to be live in English
Looks like new chapters are being added through Action Pizazz. I saw new chapters in 2021-03 and 04.
That art style is beautiful. Instant Fav.

The story so far: MC basically found a hidden basement in his apartment. In there were 2 girls: the doctor and the blonde girl. Doc claims that blonde has a disease causing her to be very horny that's why she is being kept underground. Later on, it was revealed that blonde was in fact being pursued by the politician from tv. (She doesn't have horny disease). Apparently, she knows an important secret and he was torturing her to make her spill it. She escaped, doc treated her and was ordered to hide her existence. Despite the danger, MC decided to take blonde outside. They got noticed by some cult group. They seem to be interested of blonde. They came back and doc didn't like MC's reckless action. She threatens to kill him, but blonde threatens to kill herself so they she gave in. This is as far as the story goes. I kinda skimmed through some lengthy texts so I might've missed some details. Feel free to ask if you want to know something more about the story
It's worth to favorite just for the art.
